author: CTPPS
body:
This PR includes elements for reconstruction of forward protons detected in the PPS subsytem.
  * Data formats: `ProtonTrack` and `ProtonTrackExtra`. The former is based on `reco::Track` to reuse the existing functionality.
  * Conditions formats: `LHCOpticalFunctionsCollection` with functions that describe proton propagation from the interaction point to the Roman Pots. `CTPPSBeamParameters` with relevant beam parameters, possibly calibrated with Roman Pot data.
  * Reconstruction module: `RecoCTPPS/ProtonReconstruction`.
  * Configuration update: proton reconstruction has been appended to the standard PPS reconstruction sequence: https://github.com/CTPPS/cmssw/blob/proton_reco_10_4_X/RecoCTPPS/Configuration/python/recoCTPPS_sequences_cff.py#L29
  * Validation suite: `Validation/CTPPS` to validate all elements in the reconstruction/simulation chain.
  * Test based on 2016 data: `Validation/CTPPS/test/year_2016`. Most files in this directory related to conditions data will be replaced by database in near future - several activities in this direction are already in progress, hopefully targeting 10_4_pre6. A test config to apply the reconstruction to LHC data: https://github.com/CTPPS/cmssw/blob/proton_reco_10_4_X/Validation/CTPPS/test/year_2016/proton_reconstruction_LHC_data/test_reconstruction_cfg.py

`runTheMatrix -l limited` only gave errors unrelated to this PR (DAS error, xroot problems).
title: PPS proton reconstruction
